QuICT.core.qubit package¶

Submodules¶

QuICT.core.qubit.qubit module¶

class QuICT.core.qubit.qubit.QState(qubit)¶

Bases: object

Implement a QState

a basic computation unit of the amplitude simulation, in which all qubits are seemed enqState with each other.

id¶

the unique identity code of a qState, which is generated globally.

Type

int

qureg¶

the qubit register of the qState

Type

Qureg

values¶

the inner amplitude of this qState

Type

np.array

force_assign_random()¶

assign random values to the qState

force_assign_zeros()¶

assign zero to the qState

force_copy(other)¶

copy other qState’s values

Parameters

other (QState) – the item to be copied.

property id¶
index_for_qubit(qubit) → int¶

find the index of qubit in this qState’s qureg

Parameters

qubit (Qubit) – the qubit need to be indexed.

Returns

the index of the qubit.

Return type

int

Raises

Exception – the qubit is not in the qState

partial_prob(indexes)¶

calculate the probabilities of the measure result of partial qureg in qState

Note that this function is a cheat function, which do not change the state of the qureg.

Parameters

indexes (list<int>) – the indexes of the partial qureg.

Returns

the probabilities of the measure result, the memory mode is LittleEndian.

Return type

list<float>

print_infomation()¶

print the infomation of the qState

property qureg¶
property values¶
class QuICT.core.qubit.qubit.Qubit(circuit)¶

Bases: object

Implement a quantum bit

Qubit is the basic unit of quantum circuits, it will appear with some certain circuit.

id¶

the unique identity code of a qubit, which is generated globally.

Type

int

qState¶

a special qureg in which all qubits may enqState with each other. class QState will be defined and introduced below.

Type

QState

circuit¶

the circuit this qubit belonged to.

Type

Circuit

measured¶

the measure result of the qubit. After apply measure gate on the qubit, the measured will be 0 or 1, otherwise raise an exception

Type

int

prob¶

the probability of measure result to be 1, which range in [0, 1]. After apply measure gate on the qubit, this attribute can be read, otherwise raise an exception

Type

float

property circuit¶
has_qState()¶

whether the qubit is belonged to a qState.

Returns

True if qubit is belonged to a qState

Return type

bool

property id¶
property measured¶
property prob¶
property qState¶
qState_clear()¶

delete the qState of the qubit

class QuICT.core.qubit.qubit.Qureg(qubits=None)¶

Bases: list

Implement a quantum register

Qureg is a list of Qubit, which is a subClass of list.

circuit¶

the circuit this qureg belonged to.

Type

Circuit

property circuit¶
force_assign_random()¶

assign random values for qureg which has initial values

after calling this function, all qubits will be in a QState.

force_assign_zeros()¶

assign zero for qureg has initial values

after calling this function, all qubits will be in a QState.

force_copy(copy_item, indexes)¶

copy values from other QState for this qureg which has initial values

after calling this function, all qubits will be in a QState.

Parameters

  • copy_item (QState) – the QState need to be copied.

  • indexes (list<int>) – the indexes of goal qubits
